title: Authors and Citation
text: Singhal K (2023). tiltIndicatorAfter: Create user facing outputs tiltIndicators. R package version 0.0.0.9007, https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/tiltIndicatorAfter/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tiltIndicatorAfter: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators},   author = {Kalash Singhal},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9007},   url = {https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/tiltIndicatorAfter/}, }

what: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
title: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
text: goal tiltIndicatorAfter conduct post-processing four indicators created tiltIndicator package. post-processing process cleans useless data adds additional columns. processed output tiltIndicatorAfter package final output user. repository hosts public code may show fake data.

title: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
text: can install development version tiltIndicator GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("2DegreesInvesting/tiltIndicatorAfter")

title: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
code: library(tiltIndicatorAfter)  packageVersion("tiltIndicatorAfter") #> [1] '0.0.0.9000'  ep_companies #> # A tibble: 3 × 7 #>   company_name country company_city postcode address  main_activity companies_id #>   <chr>        <chr>   <chr>           <dbl> <chr>    <chr>         <chr>        #> 1 company C    austria voitsberg        8570 ruhmann… service prov… id3          #> 2 company B    germany berlin          13353 sprenge… distributor   id2          #> 3 company A    germany frankfurt       60316 wittels… manufacturer… id1  matches_mapper #> # title: Creates final output of ictr company level results — prepare_ictr_company
